state.hazardous: The quality of air is dangerously wrong. Those at risk should be avoided to go outside. The others should limit the output to minimum.Outdoor activities are discouraged.
state.bad: Air quality is bad. People at risk should avoid to go outside. Not recommended for outdoor activities.
state.satisfactory: Air quality is average. The air pollution pose a threat for people at risk which may experience health effects. Other people should limit spending time outdoors, especially when they experience symptoms such as cough or sore throat.
state.moderate: Air quality is acceptable. Air pollution can endanger people at risk. Conditions good for for outdoor activities.
state.good: Air quality is still good. The air pollution pose minimal risk to exposed persons. Conditions very good for outdoor activities.
state.very_good: The air quality is good. The air pollution pose no threat. The conditions ideal for outdoor activities.
